Uses of Class
it.unipr.warehouse.Order

Packages that use Order
Package
Description
it.unipr.accounts
This package contains all the classes necessary to manage the main actors of this program.
it.unipr.controllers.employee
This package contains all the classes needed for the management of the employee interface Through the four controllers, EmploueeController, OrderController, PersonController, ProductController, all the functionalities of the employee and administrator are covered.
it.unipr.utilities
This package contains the class Constants which provides to the software al its needed constant values.
it.unipr.warehouse
This package contains all the classes necessary to manage the orders' lists and also products' maps
